name: Return to The Night of the Zealot

achievements.title: The Zealot's Revenge
achievements.text: Have Lita Chantler’s [reaction] ability deal the killing blow to the Ghoul Priest.

achievements.title: I Don't Trust Her
achievements.text: When given the option to add Lita Chantler to your deck, refuse to do so.

achievements.title: Insurance Doesn’t Cover Ghouls
achievements.text: Burn your house to the ground in “The Gathering.”

achievements.title: …But Do I Have To?
achievements.text: In “The Midnight Masks,” have each investigator remain in Your House for the first three rounds.

achievements.title: Conspiracy of Silence
achievements.text: Find and interrogate all six unique cultists in “The Midnight Masks.”

achievements.title: Tour of Arkham
achievements.text: Trigger each of the “once per game” abilities on all of the locations in play in “The Midnight Masks.”

achievements.title: Do You Get It Now?
achievements.text: Trigger the Forced ability on Billy Cooper by defeating the Ghoul Priest at his location.

achievements.title: Pinch Hitter
achievements.text: Defeat three [[Ghoul]] enemies with a Baseball Bat without it breaking.

achievements.title: Even Death May Die
achievements.text: Defeat Umôrdhoth while the Vault of Earthly Demise is attached to it.

achievements.title: Break the Circle
achievements.text: Complete “The Devourer Below” without Umôrdhoth spawning.

achievements.title: They’re Just Misunderstood
achievements.text: Win the Night of the Zealot campaign without defeating a single unique [[Cultist]] enemy.

achievements.title: Umôrdhoth’s Favor
achievements.text: Win the Night of the Zealot campaign without defeating a single [[Ghoul]] enemy.

achievements.title: Line in the Sand
achievements.text: Win the Night of the Zealot campaign with at least three Ultimatums active.

achievements.title: Arkham Expertise
achievements.text: Win the Night of the Zealot campaign on Expert difficulty.
